archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.1.7c: c) determining the scale of the assessment (e.g. a particular process or project, one or more assets, a specific region or individual business unit; or a combination of both).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
